Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 97-1 Filed 12/14/20 Page 2 of 4
CONFIDENTIAL/PRIVILEGED/SEALED
November 19, 2020

Dear Judge Nathan,
I respectfully submit this letter in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's bail application.
History
1.
2.
3.
4. The person described in the criminal charges is not the person we know. I have never witnessed anything close to inappropriate with Ghislaine; quite to the contrary, the Ghislaine I know is a wonderful and loving person.
5. Until the explosion of media interest that followed the arrest and subsequent death in custody of Jeffrey Epstein in July thru August 2019.
Privacy
1 | Page
DOJ-OGR-00002019

text_blocks.content: I respectfully submit this letter in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's bail application.

4. The person described in the criminal charges is not the person we know. I have never witnessed anything close to inappropriate with Ghislaine; quite to the contrary, the Ghislaine I know is a wonderful and loving person.
5. Until the explosion of media interest that followed the arrest and subsequent death in custody of Jeffrey Epstein in July thru August 2019.
